entry.tran: 古老的;陈旧的;老掉牙的
entry.def: If you describe a problem or subject as hoary, you mean that it is old and familiar.

example.ex: ...the hoary old myth that women are unpredictable.
example.tran: “女人心，海底针”这种老一套的鬼话

means.word_mean: 1. showing characteristics of age, especially having gray or white hair;
3. covered with fine whitish hairs or down
